The video in question was published on A: 2016, and has been watched over three million times on Facebook.
The accompanying caption of the video: when translated to English, claims that Senator De Lima admitted to being a protector of drug peddlers.
Senator De Lima was arrested in February: However, she maintains her innocence and believes the accusation is politically motivated.
The misleading video is an edited versio: 2016, where she defended herself against accusations of involvement in the drug trade at Bilibid Prison.
